Kup:

Kup took an Sleepy Elita and said softly "I'm close enought to Rodimu=
s to assure that he wouldnt be easy to reprogram as Predacon in normal circ=
untances, but when the matrix was captured... It's hard to explain... Night=
light jsut was a bait... it isnt the frist time that hydras capture her....=
 When Elita was a baby, Hydras snatched her from inside the base... a maxim=
al died tried to rescue her but we failed... she was reprogramed then and I=
 should admit it, Perceptor did an excellent job"said with bitterness Kup"S=
he almost died when we reprogramed her back to her maximal original program=
"and looking to elita  he added "After the matrix were captured, she again =
disappeared this time Hydras used a posed maximal to lure her out our sight=
... We knew that she had disapeared cause she always gives Elita her good n=
ight kiss, she never have missed it... Rodimus ran outside the base looking=
 for her and he disappeared too; I guess that Hydras took advantage of Rodi=
mus's emotional status to break him... We had just loose the battle and we =
didnt pay attention when they have vanished"

Kup Shook his head "I told yo=
u, Tucson, once we get them out side the BlackFortress wotn be easy to repr=
ogram them back to Maximal... I almost Willing to force Perceptor to tell u=
s what kind of locks he had done even it that mean to forget all Maximals a=
nd Autobots protocols"



From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, March 15, 2010 9:18 PM=

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  
Tucson nodds=
 and opens an energy port leading directly into his left wrist. 

"Yes, tha=
t sounds good Lord Elder. Here, this will make it easy to administer the en=
ergon." 

He takes a seat near everyone but especially near Elita. Rodimus =
and Nightlight were already taken from her and he was not about to let her =
fall into the same fate. Her sadness to him is a torture he felt she did no=
t deserve. She had done nothing to no one and in return was suffering a gre=
at deal. This angers him yet he tries desperately to hold back his elevatin=
g temper. He cracks his knuckles to try and calm himself down although at t=
his point, he didn't know if he could ever calm down.

"As if the battle be=
tween us and Unicron wasn't enough. Now Hydras, Cyclonus and Scourge have t=
o go on a meaningless power trip and torment innocent Autobots and Maximals=
 without rime or reason. I know if Rodimus were in his right mind, he would=
 not tolerate it, and certainly not Optimus. As far as I heard from what I =
learned while at the fortress, Cyclonus is feeding off the power of the Mat=
rix which is in Rodimus's body. That's what's making him stronger. Well, gu=
ess what? I'm prepared to cut that umbilcal cord no matter how much it dama=
ges my own spark. I learned something about self worth. What am I worth? Ho=
w can I be worth something when there are lives just starting out there tha=
t are more precious than my own? And how can I say I'm worth something when=
 we have young aspiring Autobots and Maximals just starting their careers a=
s soldiers? They have their whole lives ahead of them, and by Primus I'm pr=
epared to give back what's been taken from them, THEIR FREEDOM!"
